Headline: #8 Halsted Temporary Southbound Reroute near Halsted/38th
ShortDescription: SB 8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, Root and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/38th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8 Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, 35th, Wallace, Root and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Halsted/38th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
